Control Name: CP-2 (5) CONTINUE  ESSENTIAL MISSIONS / BUSINESS FUNCTIONS
Control Statement: The organization plans for the continuance of essential missions and business functions with little or no loss of operational continuity and sustains that continuity until full information system restoration at primary processing and/or storage sites.
